abstract.para: Even though in most cases &cockpit; is present on &productnameshort; by default, there may be certain cases when &cockpit; is missing. This topic provides instructions on how to install it and enable its service.

section.title: Introduction
section.para: &cockpit; is included in the delivered pre-built images by default, or can be installed if you are installing your own instances manually. For details regarding the manual installation, refer to the deployment guide. by installing the cockpit-ws package. Reboot afterwards to apply the changes.

section.title: Installing additional &cockpit; plugins
section.para: Though &cockpit; is present in the pre-built images, the plugin for administration of virtual machines needs to be installed manually by installing the microos-cockpitpatternnot all its plugins are installed by default. note.title: Cockpit's plugins installed from the microos-cockpit pattern may differ according to technologies installed on your system
note.para: The plugin Podman containers is installed only if the Containers Runtime for non-clustered systems patterns are installed on your system. Similarly, the Virtual Machines plugin is installed only if the KVM Virtualization Host pattern is installed on your system.
